entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow and local blowing snow beginning this evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 05 March 2023
